sub_title: Head of Portfolio and Project Management Office at Signify
summary:
Sven van Leuken is an emphatic and result driven certified project manager (PMP)® with a strong technical background and has participated in many full cycle SAP projects. 
His 25+ years of technical experience, combined with his delivery management/project management/scrum master expertise, allow him to easily bridge the gap between business and IT and make him the perfect fit for any (political) sensitive organization. 

Sven has got profound communication skills and is continuously trying to unleash potential, via mentoring and coaching, to bring individuals to a higher level and to keep his team motivated.  

His passion, team spirit and ambition to achieve goals are not only visible in his personal (sport) life, as he acted as chairman of the youth committee, it also shows in the execution of his work where his passion for project management is combined with the dedication and perseverance to achieve business goals, together with his team.

education.degree_name: Bachelor of Information and Communication Technology (B ICT), Logistics and Information Management

certifications.name: Project Portfolio Management (PPM) Fundamentals On Demand (Utah)
Scrum Fundamentals Certified Credential (SFC)
certifications.authority: SCRUMstudy - Accreditation Body for Scrum and Agile;Download Free Scrum Body of Knowledge(340 pages)

company.name: SCRUMstudy - Accreditation Body for Scrum and Agile

certifications.name: SAP Certified Application Associate- Business Intelligence with SAP NetWeaver 7.0

authors.headline: Head of Portfolio and Project Management Office at Signify

profile_positions.description: Digital Portfolio Manager and Head of Portfolio and Project Management Office in the Strategy, Governance and PMO team within Signify's CDIO office
profile_positions.title: Head of Portfolio and Project Management Office / MT-member CDIO office

profile_positions.description: Managing EIM (Enterprise Information Management) delivery and being part of EIM MT
profile_positions.title: Delivery Manager / MT-member EDA (Enterprise Data & Analytics)

profile_positions.description: Certified Project Manager (PMP®), MT member and SAP BI Solution architect with a drive to develop, engage and lead new talent within the SAP BI practice.
profile_positions.title: (certified PMP) Project Manager / MT-member SAP BI service line

profile_positions.description: Project manager of the upgrade of the (HELIOS) SAP BW environment (sandbox, development, quality and production) from version 7.4 towards 7.5
profile_positions.title: Project Manager - SAP BW 7.5 upgrade

profile_positions.description: Project manager of a Proof of Concept in which HUE activation data, residing in Amazon S3, will be "blended" with sales data residing in SAP HANA to generate a model used within SAP Analytics Cloud for a sell in/sell out-dashboard.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager - POC HUE activation data

profile_positions.description: Project Manager for the BOBJ upgrade in which we're upgrading BOBJ (and AFO, Lumira and Design Studio) towards version 4.2 SP5 and afterwards patching the entire landscape to 4.2 SP5 patch 0004
profile_positions.title: Project Manager - BOBJ upgrade

profile_positions.description: Interim IT Service Manager Lighting EIM Services
profile_positions.title: Interim IT Service Manager, IT global business services & insight

profile_positions.description: Project Manager for the BODS upgrade in which we're upgrading BODS and Information Steward towards version 4.2 SP10.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager - BODS upgrade

profile_positions.description:
Project Manager for the eSDH (Enabling Shared Data Hub) - project which replaces the PDS (People Data Services)-, MDIT (Master Data for IT)- and GDM (Global Master data Management) applications (owned by Royal Philips) with a new Lighting Master Data Services (MDS) solution.  
MDS is supported by Microsoft's (Azure cloud) platform and is being populated using DataFactory, SSIS and LogicApps. eSDH acts as a datahub and provides information towards Flexera, Concur, ServiceNow,  Azure AD, AMEX GBT, Tangoe, Concur, Ethicspoint, SAP BW, SAP BCS and IBM connections.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager - eSDH project

profile_positions.description: Project Manager for the SAP HANA 2.0 upgrade in which a complete new DTAP street (incl. RedHat 7.3 upgrade) will be created by copying (and upgrading) the current HANA 1.0 (multitenant) landscape to its new (single tenant) environment
profile_positions.title: Project Manager - HANA 2.0 upgrade

profile_positions.description: (One of the) Project manager(s) within the LUX program which facilitates the migration of all applications, as part of Lighting split from Royal Philips, to the new IAM infrastructure. Responsible for the BOBJ, BODS, Qlikview, Native Hana, SLT and Helios migration.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager - LUX migration

profile_positions.description: Project Manager for the "Reporting for Markets" project which goal is to replace the local sales applications in France with Helios, the SAP BI platform of Philips Lighting
profile_positions.title: Project Manager - Reporting for Markets France

profile_positions.description: Project manager for the TPW (Transport, Package and Warehouse) project which purpose is to decommission current 3PB and CDW applications and have their reports be migrated to the SAP BI platform, using SAP BODS as provisiong platform
profile_positions.title: Project Manager - TPW project

profile_positions.description: Project Manager responsible for enabling SAP HANA MDC (Multi Database Containers aka Multi-Tenancy), enabling SLT, Gateway and  Webdispatcher and upgrading towards RedHat Linux 6.7 and towards SAP SPS12.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager - MDC enablement

profile_positions.description:
Project Manager for the NPS (Net Promotor Score) project

NPS data for Philips Lighting is collected by an external agency and is provided in an Excel format. This project will replace the current (local) Excel database by an SAP HANA  database and the current Excel based NPS dashboard will be (re-)created using SAP Analysis for Office.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager - NPS project

profile_positions.description:
Scrum Master/Project Manager for the POS (Point of Sales) project

Scrum Master/Project Mgr of a disentanglement project in which the Philips Lighting relevant part of the POS DIR (Point-of-Sales / Demand Information Repository) solution from the general OneBi system has to be redesigned/re-build within the Philips Lighting specific Helios system. The redesigned solution is build using a combination of SAP BODS, SAP BW and SAP UI5.
profile_positions.title: Scrum Master / Project Manager - POS project

profile_positions.description:
The VNSG (Dutch SAP User Group) has been established in 1988 and provides support to members in increasing the added value of SAP software in their organization. On one hand by encouraging and organizing knowledge sessions, on the other hand through the representation of members'​ interests towards SAP.

More information regarding the SAP BI focus group can be found at http://www.vnsg.nl/bi
profile_positions.title: SAP BI Special Interest Group - Core team member

profile_positions.description:
Scrum Master/Project Manager of the BIG (BI Greenfield) project

Scrum Master/Project Manager of an >15 FTE (onsite-/offshore) scrum team who are implementing a new data warehouse architecture, using SAP BW7.4 in combination with the SAP HANA platform, enabling a high-performance enterprise data warehouse. 

Keywords: Agile, Scrum, Version1, PMBOK, ASML's FMO program
profile_positions.title: Scrum Master / Project Manager - SAP BI Greenfield (BIG) project

profile_positions.description:
Implementation of Layered, Scalable Architecture (LSA), SAP's best practice for Enterprise Data Warehousing
Introduction of fail-safe data model and loading mechanism
Incident handling (redesign) on several CRM datamodels within SAP BW
Performance analysis and improvement for Crystal Report infosets
Redesigning the Order Entry and Orderbook datamodel and reporting layer
Redesigning the Revenue datamodel and reporting layer
profile_positions.title: Principal SAP BI Consultant

profile_positions.description:
2012
November: Winner Innovation Program @Ciber with a proposition called GRiP (Generating Revenue Potential) which later on became Ciber ProfitBoost

2013
Februari: 3rd place SAP HANA Race @SAP AG (Walldorf, Germany) with our Ciber ProfitBoost proposition (a combination of HANA, PAL & multiple Front-End tools)
October: 2nd place Demo Jam at the Plattform Innovations Forum (Mannheim, Germany)

For more info: http://www.ciber.com/us/index.cfm/search/?q=profitboost

Gained hands-on expierence with SAP Predictive Analytics (PA), SAP Lumira and SAP HANA
profile_positions.title: Ciber ProfitBoost consultant

Reporting fit/gap analysis, Interface development (OpenHub)
